courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of JavaScript programming with hands-on exercises and real-world projects.
courses.detailedDescription: This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know about JavaScript, from variables and functions to advanced concepts like closures and async programming.

courses.title: React Development
courses.description: Build modern web applications with React, including hooks, state management, and component architecture.
courses.detailedDescription: Learn to build scalable React applications with modern best practices. This course covers components, hooks, state management, routing, and testing.

courses.title: CSS Grid & Flexbox
courses.description: Master modern CSS layout techniques to create responsive and beautiful web designs.
courses.detailedDescription: Become proficient in CSS Grid and Flexbox to create complex, responsive layouts with ease. Learn when and how to use each layout method effectively.

courses.title: Node.js Backend
courses.description: Learn server-side development with Node.js, Express, and database integration.
courses.detailedDescription: Build robust backend applications with Node.js and Express. Learn about APIs, databases, authentication, and deployment strategies.

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python programming with a focus on data analysis, visualization, and machine learning basics.
courses.detailedDescription: Master Python for data science with hands-on projects using pandas, numpy, matplotlib, and scikit-learn. Perfect for beginners and professionals looking to transition into data science.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of user interface and user experience design with practical projects.
courses.detailedDescription: Learn design thinking, user research, wireframing, prototyping, and visual design principles. Create stunning user interfaces that provide excellent user experiences.
